verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Why should I charge my soul with care? The wealth of ev'ry mine Belongs to Christ, God’s Son and Heir, And He’s a Friend of mine.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Yes, He’s a Friend of mine, And He with me doth all things share; Since all is Christ’s, and Christ is mine, Why should I have a care? For Jesus is a Friend of mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The silver moon, the golden sun, The countless stars that shine, Are His alone, yes, ev'ry one, And He’s a Friend of mine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He daily spreads a glorious feast, And at His table dine The whole creation, man and beast, And He’s a Friend of mine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And when He comes in bright array, And leads the conquering line, It will be glory then to say, And He’s a Friend of mine.
